verses.text: Now Ahab \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Jezebel \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* Elijah \w had|strong="H5030"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w how|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H5030"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Jezebel \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Elijah, saying, “\w May|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gods \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* ever \w so|strong="H6213"\w* severely, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w like|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* killed!”

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H4397"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w broom|strong="H7574"\w* \w tree|strong="H7574"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w fell|strong="H3462"\w* \w asleep|strong="H3462"\w*. \w Suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w an|strong="H6965"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w him|strong="H8478"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* said, “\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* eat.”

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* \w around|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w by|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w head|strong="H4763"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cake|strong="H5692"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w bread|strong="H5692"\w* baked over hot \w coals|strong="H7529"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jar|strong="H6835"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* ate \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* Elijah entered \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spent|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* doing \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, Elijah?”

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H7065"\w* \w very|strong="H7065"\w* \w zealous|strong="H7065"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w torn|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* well.”

After \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* after \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H1827"\w*, \w small|strong="H1851"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4191"\w* \w escapes|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H2719"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* Elisha \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4191"\w* \w escapes|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H2719"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*.
